caption:
From Executive Producer Chris Pratt and award-winning filmmakers Rich Hull and Justin D. Roberts, ‘Fighting Spirit: A Combat Chaplain’s Journey’ explores the extraordinary heroism and sacrifice of U.S. combat chaplains throughout every American war — spiritual warriors who enter the battlefield without weapons, providing courage and comfort to soldiers of all backgrounds.

A rare 100% Rotten Tomatoes Popcornmeter rating from audiences nationwide who have been moved by this incredible story. Watch the documentary TOMORROW on @appletv or your preferred VOD platform. www.fightingspiritfilm.com

#FightingSpiritFilm #itsacalling #ArmyChaplainCorps #ArmyChaplains #filmreview #rottentomatoes #documentary #newfilm
